field.name: order_flat_enable
field.label: Enable Order Flat Shipping Override
field.description: If this setting is enabled, every order will have a flat rate of shipping specified in the text field.

field.name: order_flat_value
field.label: Order Flat Shipping Value
field.description: Set the flat shipping rate for every order

field.name: threshold_enable
field.label: Enable Free Shipping Threshold
field.description: To offer free shipping on all SUBTOTALS over a certain amount, enable this option and then add a threshold order value to be reached.

field.name: threshold_value
field.label: Threshold Value
field.description: Shipping will be free if the order total reached this value

field.name: capping_enable
field.label: Enable Shipping Fee Capping
field.description: If enabled, the shipping fee will be 'capped' at the specified amount or capped to the most expensive item to ship. For example, if the most expensive item to ship is €20, then the order shipping total will be capped to €20.

field.name: capping_type
field.label: Capping Type
field.description: Choose to cap the shipping to a specified value or to the most expensive item to ship

field.name: capping_value
field.label: Capping Value
field.description: Shipping will be capped to this value
